channel.title: [Source][VB] Read- and WriteFile
channel.description:
Well, the functions name basically explain it, they read and write files...
[code]Function SaveFile(Path As String, Text As String) Dim fnum As Long fnum = FreeFile Open Path For Output As fnum Print #fnum, Text Close fnum End Function
Function ReadFile(Path As String) As String Dim fnum As Long fnum = FreeFile Open Path For Input As #fnum ReadFile = Input$(LOF(fnum), fnum) Close #fnum End Function[/code]

item.title: [Source][VB] Read- and WriteFile
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

Well, the functions name basically explain it, they read and write files...

Function SaveFile(Path As String, Text As String)
Dim fnum As Long
    fnum = FreeFile
    Open Path For Output As fnum
        Print #fnum, Text
    Close fnum
End Function
Function ReadFile(Path As String) As String
Dim fnum As Long
    fnum = FreeFile
    Open Path For Input As #fnum
       ReadFile = Input$(LOF(fnum), fnum)
    Close #fnum
End Function

Read full topic
